title: The Lady Who Chained Her Baby to the Bed
description: STARVING TEEN GIRL FOUND CHAINED TO BED MARYLAND COUPLE ARRESTED FOR CHAINING GIRL TO BED FOR HAVING BAD REPORT CARD... the headlines screamed. But what really happened on that spring morning? What really led up to the events of that horrific morning in June 2006? In a voice that is raw and uncut, Baltimore author Tial L. Lincoln recounts with brutal honest her four month ordeal at the Women's Detention Center in Baltimore City. It answers the question on everybody's mind. How and why could someone do something like this? The Lady Who Chained Her Baby To The Bed reads like fiction, but is an all true riveting account filled with despair, pain, and bad choices. It's an unforgettable reading experience of self discovery and how a woman made peace with herself and an inspiring testament of the healing powers of prayer.
author: Tia Lincoln
